name: Forget-Me-Not: Harvesting Memories
description:
Forget-Me-Not is a short game submitted to Ludum Dare 52 where you play as Zinnia, who grows memory flowers for clients who want to experience memories of their deceased loved ones.

Controls:

- Mouse to navigate menus

- WASD to move, shift to run, space to jump

- Escape to open options

- Tab is journal

- E is interact

- 1,2,3,4 to drop item in respective inventory slots

- Space to navigate dialogue
